title: Deals: Microsoft’s folding Surface Duo 2 sees first discount at $350 off, Chromebooks, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by the first discount on Microsoft’s new Surface Duo 2 at $250 off. That’s alongside the best price of the year on ASUS Chromebook Flip CM3 and a new low for DJI’s modular Action 2 camera. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Microsoft’s folding Surface Duo 2 sees first discount at $350 off, Chromebooks, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Microsoft's new Surface Duo 2 is seeing its very first discount at $250 off alongside Chromebooks and much more to start the week.
